article_title: U.S. Plans to Sell Missiles to India for its Submarines
article_text:
NEW DELHI—The U.S. plans to sell two dozen antiship missiles to India for an estimated $200 million, underscoring the fast-expanding defense ties between the two nations.

The Boeing Co. Harpoon missiles would be used on Indian submarines, the U.S. Defense Department said.

The Pentagon said the deal was intended to "strengthen the...
